text: Iconoclasts may refer to: * Iconoclasts (religion), who advocate the destruction of religious images (icons), paintings and sculptures * Iconoclasts (politics), who advocate the destruction of artifacts and monuments, because of some political reason * Iconoclasts (TV series), a Sundance Channel show * Iconoclasts (video game), an action platformer video game ==See also== * Iconoclast (disambiguation)
title: Iconoclasts
